document.description: Target Store – Rt. 82 – west of 1-71 ... both trips all buses will make one stop at a fast food restaurant. ... Make check or money order out to Footprint Tours ...
document.body: MIAMI UNIVERSITY TO NORTHEASTERN OHIO CHARTERED BUS SERVICE FALL-3-DAY-BREAK OCTOBER 11 AND 14, 2012 LOCATION OF PICK-UP AND DROP-OFF POINTS: CLEVELAND SUBURBS (WEST) AND LORAIN COUNTY K-Mart - 5350 Leavitt Rd. - Lorain Target Store Rt. 82 west of 1-71 Strongsville AKRON TJ Maxx at West Market Plaza Rt. 18&I-77 Akron CLEVELAND SUBURBS (EAST) Beachwood Library 25501 Shaker Blvd.- Beachwood COST: ROUND TRIP - $85.00 ONE WAY - $70.00 _______________________________________________________________________________________ THURSDAY, OCTOBER 11, 2012: ALL BUSES - COOK FIELD LOAD 3:30 PM AND DEPART 4:00 PM BUS #1 Target Store Strongsville Arrive 9:00 PM K-Mart - Lorain Arrive 9:30 PM BUS #2 TJ Maxx at West Market Plaza Akron Arrive 9:00 PM Beachwood Library Beachwood Arrive 9:45 PM _____________________________________________________________________________________ SUNDAY, OCTOBER 14, 2012: BUS #1 K-Mart - Lorain Load 1:45 PM and Depart 2:00 PM Target Store Strongsville Load 2:30 PM and Depart 2:45 PM BUS # 2 Beachwood Library - Beachwood Load 1:30 PM and Depart 1:45 PM TJ Maxx at West Market Plaza Akron Load 2:30 PM and Depart 2:45 PM ALL BUSES: MIAMI UNIVERSITY Arrive 8:00 PM _______________________________________________________________________________________ All buses will make stops at various residence quads on the RETURN trip. On both trips all buses will make one stop at a fast food restaurant. Any purchases made will be at the expense of the passengers. RESERVATION DEADLINE: Thursday, October 4, 2012 CANCELLATION FEE: $30.00 REFUND POLICY: Refunds are given only on canceled reservations. No refunds will be given if cancellation occurs ON OR AFTER Tuesday, October 9, 2012. Reservation fee is NOT transferable to another trip. THE REASON FOR CANCELLATION HAS NO BEARING ON OUR REFUND POLICY. PASSENGER WILL BE CHARGED A $10.00 FEE FOR ANY CHECK RETURNED FROM BANK FOR INSUFFICIENT FUNDS. RESTRICTIONS: ABSOLUTELY NO ALCOHOL, NO SMOKING, AND NO ANIMALS OF ANY KIND ON THE BUS. IF YOU ARE NOT ON TIME, THE BUS WILL LEAVE WITHOUT YOU. NO EXCEPTIONS BE PROMPT! FOR MORE INFORMATION: Phone 440.244.5100 Fax 440.244.5102 E-Mail tours@footprinttours.net .. Make check or money order out to Footprint Tours, Inc. and mail along with reservation to: Footprint Tours, Inc., 401 Broadway Avenue Suite B, Lorain, Ohio 44052. STUDENT NAME________________________________________________________________________ SCHOOL ADDRESS______________________________________________________________________ (Include room #&dorm if on campus) HOME ADDRESS________________________________________________________________________ (include city; state; zip code) SCHOOL PHONE # (____)__________________________HOME PHONE #(___)_____________________ TYPE OF SERVICE: ________ROUND TRIP ________ ONE WAY DATE OF SERVICE: From Miami University to Northeastern Ohio: ________October 11 Drop-off Point_______________________________________ From Northeastern Ohio to Miami University: ________October 14 Pick-up Point________________________________________ TOTAL AMOUNT ENCLOSED: $__________________________
